verses.verse: But it came to pass that <S%H5571><s%>, when Sanballat heard <S%H8085><s%> that we were building <S%H1129><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%>, he was wroth <S%H2734><s%>, and took great <S%H7235><s%> indignation <S%H3707><s%>, and mocked <S%H3932><s%> the Jews <S%H3064><s%>.

and cover <S%H3680><s%> not their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and let not their sin <S%H2403><s%> be blotted out <S%H4229><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H3707><s%>; for they have provoked thee to anger before the builders <S%H1129><s%>.

So we built <S%H1129><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%>; and all the wall <S%H2346><s%> was joined together <S%H7194><s%> unto half <S%H2677><s%> the height thereof <S%H5971><s%>: for the people had a mind <S%H3820><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%>.

But it came to pass that <S%H5571><s%>, when Sanballat, and Tobiah <S%H2900><s%>, and the Arabians <S%H6163><s%>, and the Ammonites <S%H5984><s%>, and the Ashdodites <S%H796><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> that the repairing of the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> went forward <S%H724><s%>, and that the breaches <S%H6555><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to be stopped <S%H5640><s%>, then they were very <S%H3966><s%> wroth <S%H2734><s%>;
and they conspired <S%H7194><s%> all of them together <S%H3162><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and to cause confusion therein <S%H6213><s%>.
But we made our prayer <S%H6419><s%> unto our God <S%H430><s%>, and set <S%H5975><s%> a watch <S%H4929><s%> against them day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>, because of them <S%H6440><s%>.

And our adversaries <S%H6862><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, They shall not know <S%H3045><s%>, neither see <S%H7200><s%>, till we come <S%H935><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H2026><s%>, and slay them <S%H4399><s%>, and cause the work to cease <S%H7673><s%>.

And it came to pass that <S%H3064><s%>, when the Jews that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> by them <S%H681><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, they said <S%H559><s%> unto us ten <S%H6235><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> from all places <S%H4725><s%>, Ye must return unto us <S%H7725><s%>.

Therefore set <S%H5975><s%> I in the lowest <S%H8482><s%> parts <S%H4725><s%> of the space behind <S%H310><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%>, in the open places <S%H6706><s%>, I set <S%H5975><s%> there the people <S%H5971><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%> with their swords <S%H2719><s%>, their spears <S%H7420><s%>, and their bows <S%H7198><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H341><s%>, when our enemies heard <S%H8085><s%> that it was known <S%H3045><s%> unto us <S%H430><s%>, and God had brought <S%H6565><s%> their counsel <S%H6098><s%> to nought <S%H6565><s%>, that we returned <S%H7725><s%> all of us to the wall <S%H2346><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> unto his work <S%H4399><s%>.

And it came to pass from that time <S%H3117><s%> forth <S%H2677><s%>, that half of my servants <S%H5288><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> in the work <S%H4399><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of them held <S%H2388><s%> the spears <S%H7420><s%>, the shields <S%H4043><s%>, and the bows <S%H7198><s%>, and the coats <S%H8302><s%> of mail <S%H8269><s%>; and the rulers were behind <S%H310><s%> all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

They all builded <S%H1129><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%> and they that bare <S%H5375><s%> burdens <S%H5447><s%> laded <S%H6006><s%> themselves <S%H259><s%>; every one with one of his hands <S%H3027><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> in the work <S%H4399><s%>, and with the other <S%H259><s%> held <S%H2388><s%> his weapon <S%H7973><s%>;

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto the nobles <S%H2715><s%>, and to the rulers <S%H5461><s%> and to the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, The work <S%H4399><s%> is great <S%H7235><s%> and large <S%H7342><s%>, and we are separated <S%H6504><s%> upon the wall <S%H2346><s%>, one <S%H376><s%> far from <S%H7350><s%> another <S%H251><s%>:

in what place <S%H4725><s%> soever ye hear <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, resort <S%H6908><s%> ye thither unto us <S%H430><s%>; our God will fight for us <S%H3898><s%>.

So we wrought <S%H6213><s%> in the work <S%H4399><s%>: and half <S%H2677><s%> of them held <S%H2388><s%> the spears <S%H7420><s%> from the rising <S%H5927><s%> of the morning <S%H7837><s%> till the stars <S%H3556><s%> appeared <S%H3318><s%>.

Likewise at the same time <S%H6256><s%> said <S%H559><s%> I unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Let every one <S%H376><s%> with his servant <S%H5288><s%> lodge <S%H3885><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, that in the night <S%H3915><s%> they may be a guard <S%H4929><s%> to us <S%H4399><s%>, and may labor in the day <S%H3117><s%>.
